WorkItem.Description:
I'd like to be able to do this (with automatic updating):

<?xml version="1.0"?>

<root 
  xmlns="urn:ChirpyConfig" 
  xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
  xsi:schemaLocation="urn:ChirpyConfig http://www.weirdlover.com/chirpy/chirp.xsd">

  <FileGroup Name="mash.960.css" Minify ="False">
    <File Path="reset.css"/>
    <File Path="text.css"/>
    <File Path="960.css"/>
  </FileGroup>
  
  <FileGroup Name="mash.css" Minify="False">
    <File Path="mash.960.css"/>
    <File Path="site.css"/>
  </FileGroup>

  <FileGroup Name="mash.min.css" Minify="True" MinifyAt="Build">
    <File Path="mash.css"/>
  </FileGroup>  
</root>

So, if 960.css is updated, ALL of the mashed files get updated. 
If site.css is updated, mash.css and mash.min.css get updated (on build).
